item.title: Kalshi Rolls Out Tokenized Event Contracts On Solana As Rivalry With Polymarket Grows: Report
item.description: Kalshi’s move to tokenize event bets on Solana comes as prediction-market volumes surge and competition with Polymarket intensifies.

item.title: Instagram Chief Wants Staff To Return To Office Full Time: Report
item.description: Business Insider reported on Monday, citing an internal memo, that Mosseri wants Instagram staff to be at the office five days a week.

item.title: Snowflake Heads Into Earnings With Fresh Bullish Wall Street Targets — Traders Expect The Stock To ‘Make A Decent Move’
item.description: Analysts have been raising price targets ahead of Snowflake’s Q3 results, while retail traders on Stocktwits are positioning for a potential post-earn...

item.title: Capricor Therapeutics Stock Sparks Retail Frenzy As Traders Hail ‘Best Data’ Ahead Of DMD Data Readout
item.description: Capricor said in early November that it expects to announce results from the HOPE-3 trial in the coming weeks.

item.title: Nvidia Faces Wall Street’s Only ‘Sell’ Rating — Analyst Warns Of ‘Opaque Accounting’ And Rising Competitive Pressure
item.description: Seaport reiterated its lone ‘sell’ rating on Nvidia, citing opaque accounting practices, heavy obligations and rising competitive pressure.
